thread.section_title: Gym Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Direct | www.gymdirect.com.au
thread.title: Brendan

author: Brendan
title: Brendan
text: I've bought from Gym Direct 4 times now. They have a big range of gear. I've always found the products I've bought to be decent quality and priced very well. If i had to nit pick on something.... I bought 2 olympic bars and on one of them the knurling was a bit uneven and messy in a couple of spots. Not a deal breaker but it means being a little more careful where you put your hands! and having said that, the other bar was perfect! I've always picked my orders up so i have no comment on their delivery service!
